meta.label: Enrich using Extractor / Magic (Bulk extract / Chain)
meta.author: Dataiku (Jean-Baptiste Rouquier)

params.name: api_url
params.label: API URL
params.description: Get it from import.io “My Data → Export → Simple API integration”. It starts with https://api.import.io/

params.name: delay_between_api_calls
params.label: Delay between API calls
params.description: In seconds. Use it if Import.IO says it's overloaded.
